feature.name: Elevate
feature.description: Moves the elevators cabine up and down to a specified floor.

or.name: Display
or.description: Visual user output, indicating the elevators state.

feature.name: Floor
feature.description: Uses display to ouput the floor where the elevator currently is.

feature.name: Modus
feature.description: Outputs Elevators currents mode (Emergency, Cleaning, Police, Normal)

feature.name: Numbers
feature.description: Keypad where user enters floor he wants to go to

feature.name: CloseDoor
feature.description: Button to close the door immediately

feature.name: OpenDoor
feature.description: Button to open the door immediately

feature.name: PoliceMode
feature.description: Mode used by the police when they want to go to a floor as fast as possible without stops

feature.name: CleaningMode
feature.description: Mode for cleaning the elevator. Doors won't close

feature.name: EmergencyMode
feature.description: Mode indicating emergency. Call for help.

feature.name: VoiceAudio
feature.description: Speaker tells the user which floor they reached
